Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Based on your request, we'll clear out these parts of the base for other purposes, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The cleared areas will be partitioned according to their spaces and the plans to make future constructions easier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll provide you with the detailed proposal later. Commandant, all you've got to do is choose and sign.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...The bride in the white gown and the groom in the black suit exchange their rings in the church.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv?', 3: '13', 4: 'Are you talking about a wedding?', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I-I'm sorry, I didn't know you were... Ahem...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Can I help you with something, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We should be the ones asking you that. What are you reading?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Weddings? Was that why you were gawking at the church last time? Are you interested in that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I can understand that you might get curious when your new frame looks like a wedding gown.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But marriages aren't as wonderful as you think they'd be.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You don't get it, Lee! The union between two people is sacred!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Did you just get angry, Liv...?', 3: '22', 4: 'Yeah, Lee, that was uncalled for.', 5: '23'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv, you know that weddings aren't for us Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not opposing them for any special reasons. I just think that we're better off not thinking about something that won't concern us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Despite what you said, Lee... As a woman, I think they are still something we would envision...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I get it... but I can't let go of the idea of a bride in my head...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Then let's go to the church again next time.", 3: '29', 4: 'Should we give this marriage thing a shot?', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I can't ask you to take time away just to accompany me, Commandant. And I've got work to do as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Marriage... no, I... I just want to go take a look.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Go with Commandant, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You'll just keep thinking about it if you don't, won't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll rearrange our missions so that we can visit the church again.", 4: '1'}
